headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CHARNEY, LEON H

snippet: CHARNEY--Leon H. The trustees, faculty, and staff of NYU Langone Medical Center mourn the loss of Leon H. Charney, a longtime friend and generous benefactor of NYU Langone. One of his many gifts to the Medical Center established the Leon H. Charney Division of Cardiology and the Leon H. Charney Professor of Cardiovascular Medicine. Mr. Charney served as the President of Lechar Realty Corp and Partner for the L.H. Charney Associates, a real estate agency and management company. We are thankful for his extraordinary support across our entire institution and his meaningful contributions to the field of medicine. We extend our deepest condolences to his wife, Tzili, his sons, Mickey and Nati, and to all the members of the Charney family. Kenneth G. Langone, Chair, Board of Trustees, and Robert I. Grossman, MD, Dean and CEO 1/3
